values: Hi there. My name is Cassie, and this is my sale / trade journal. I will be selling a lot of different items here. I have shirts, pants, skirts, purses, CDs, etc. Mostly I'm selling it all because I have a lot of things that I don't wear or use, and I am leaving for college next Fall. I need to clear out the space so that I don't have to deal with the sorting when the time comes for me to leave. I have done many sales and trades online, and I am very reliable; I wouldn't have this journal if I didn't really want to sell you my stuff. Here are the things you need to know: I accept Paypal, postal money orders, and cash (at your own risk). I do trades occasionally. I will ship internationally, but you have to pay the extra costs. I normally ship on Mondays or Saturdays. Anything else you need to know is in the userinfo. (11.20.2004) NEW STUFF ADDED! I added a new purse to the purses section, and I added a bunch of stuff to the "random items" section, including some picture frames, some fun games, and other junk! Everything still has super-cheap prices, and I'm still offering free shipping to anyone who pays with Paypal! Also, I added accessories and bracelets to the "random items" entry. CHECK IT OUT! And buy! :)

I'm always looking for stuff. Seriously, always. And while I would really like to sell everything, some people just like to trade. So here's some stuff I want. (And even if you're not interested in my stuff, comment and let me know if you have anything!) > !!!!! Vans checkered slip-ons, size nine!!!!!!! I want these so bad it hurts. I want either black&white checkered or pink&black checkered. (or both.) I'll trade ya for 'em. <3. > Earrings! I am addicted to earrings, especially if you are re-selling large, crafty earrings from Claires or The Icing, or if you make your own. I love stars and bright colors and hoops and circles. > Non-prescription for-accessory-use-only glasses! Really want some, especially some cat-eye ones, or some with rhinestones. > I have to wear uniforms at school (yuck) and right now I'm looking for size 9 black pants. They have to be cute ones, though. No blue-jean-esque ones, either. Also looking for long-sleeved black or white polos, size medium or a smaller large, and size 9 khakis. > Black or white turtlenecks, size medium. Preferable cute formfitting ones. > Black flats. <3. Size 9. > Plain brown belt, size large. > Those beaded necklaces that look kind've retro, they're like pearls, but thicker, and multicolored. Love those. Any color. <3. > 'Jesus is my Homeboy' tee in size medium or large.

Under the cut: Evening bag, small purses, tons of belts, &more.
>> Small white evening bag with little sparkly studs all over the front. It's a pearly white, and it has a small flap on the top for you to close it with. It leaves a lot of the purse open, though. It's very ideal for prom and other elegant type evenings when you have to dress formally. I paid $18 for this at Claires. Price: $4 $3 >> Small wallet-only type purse with a place for your ID and everything else you need when you only want to carry the bare necessities. Still has the tags on it and everything, has never been used. It's made by Mudd, and someone bought it for me for Christmas, but I have never used it. It's black with white stitching, and every compartment pretty much folds out. Also ideal for little kids for a present or something... it seems like a purse that a little girl would carry to play with. Price: $2 >> Small cargo bag bought from Target for $18. Has a neat little design on it that makes it look like it is a cargo box (like on boats and stuff) with the numbers on the front. It's a khaki material, and it's not very big on the inside, but really cute. Short strap. Measurements available. Price: $5 $4 >> Thick baby blue belt with little rings on it that kind of make it look like it's disco-ish. Size 9, so probably a size large. Measurements available upon request. Price: $3 >> Silver thin glitter belt with stars. >> Pink and olive green coloured stretchy belt that went with a pair of pants I bought. Size 9, measurements available. Remember, it stretches! Price: $3 >> Baby blue and white striped canvas belt, size 9, so a size large. Measurements available. Price: $3 >> Red and white striped canvas belt, size 9, or a size large. Measurements available. Price: $3 >> Reversible pink and black canvas belt with a detachable buckle that has a glow in the dark star on it. Better picture is below. Size large. Bought it for $16 at Pacsun. Price: $6 >> Red grommet belt. Reversible belt: >> Baby blue belt with silver dots all over it. Tag reads size large, but it would fit a medium-size better. Measurements available upon request. Thin belt. Price: $4 $3
Last updated: November 30, 2004.

Under the cut: Hair straightener, winter hat with earflaps, photo album, picture frames, TONS of books, accessories, Truth or Dare Jenga, Battle of the Sexes card game, &more.
Conair regular, completely normal hair straightener. It isn't ceramic or anything. I bought this from someone else on the internet, but it doesn't really do anything for my hair, and I would like to buy a ceramic one. I don't know all the details about it, I just know it's a regular, plain Jane hair straightener. Price: $9 $8 >> Baby blue bandana with darker blue stars all over it. Really cute, I have worn it a lot on my head, but it's in good condition. Price: $2 $1 >> Brand new, never used wire frames with flowers shaped into it. There are pink jewels at the center of the flowers. I have THREE of these available, exact same design. Price: $3 >> Brand new, never used "Best Friends" frame. It's a heavy metal frame with "Best Friends" written on the outside and little flowers & dragonflies all around it. Super cute. Price: $4 $3 >> Blue's Clues lanyard. >> Old Navy black lanyard. Says "Old Navy" all the way around it. Price: $0.50 >> Two keychains, one says "If it weren't for boys, I'd quit school," and the other says "The Original Sin." Both are really cute and in good condition. Price: $1 $0.50 >> Truth or Dare Jenga, only opened and played ONE time. In really good condition, super fun and silly game to play when you are bored. Price: $6 $5 >> Battle of the Sexes card game. This is really fun to play with some of your opposite-sex friends to see how much you really know about the opposite sex! :) Price: $4 $3 >> Black/grey hait with earflaps and a white design on it. Also has a little poof-ball on the top of it. Really cute, but not my style. It's a knit-type hat. Really warm and comfy. Price: $3 >> Small black cell phone case with C initial in pink and a strap. >> Small Carebear... it's Wishbear. Price: $4 >> Small pink photo album with liquid stuff on the inside and a small blue dolphin. Never even opened, still in package. Holds 24 photos. Price: $1 >> Peter by Kate Walker. (book) Price: $2 >> The Hanged Man by Francesca Lia Block. (book) Price: $4 >> Dangerous Angels by Francesca Lia Block. (book) Price: $7 >> Echo by Francesca Lia Block. (book) Price: $4 >> A Farewell to Arms by Ernest Hemingway. (book) Price: $2 >> Blonde by Joyce Carol Oates. (book) Price: $4 >> Stargirl by Jerry Spinelli. (hardback book) Price: $5 >> The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants by Ann Brahares. (book) Price: $4 >> The Scarlet Letter by Nathaniel Hawthorne. (book) Price: $2 >> The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald. (book) Price: $2 >> Huge lot of 48 pony bead bracelets. Some have words, some are just neat patterns. And hey, you don't have to just buy them for the bracelet part! You can get them and use the beads for whatever you like! :) (pending!) >> About 6 Mardi Gras bead necklaces, including some that have neat little fish on them. (pending!) >> Rock-like necklace in a funny orange color. Really cute, but I never wear it. Price: $1 >> Hemp anklet with little silver beads on the inside. Worn about two times. Price: $2 >> Eeyore watch with Eeyore in the center and a black band. Really cute!! Needs a new battery, though. Price: $4 >> Some odd bracelets, including a blue & white criss-cross one, a orangeish-pink and white crisscross one, a few thick multicolored ones, and a pink and green glitter-filled bracelet. Each one is $1 each. >> Pink sequin wrist-slap bracelet. This is one of those bracelet things that you slap on, and it stays on your wrist. Price: $2 >> Two bangles = gone!
Last updated: December 06, 2004.

Under the cut: Heels, American Eagle pumps, sandals, &more. Sizes 7 1/2-9.
>> Size womens 9 1/2 orange Chucks. They even come with the sparkly orange shoelaces, because I can't find the white ones anywhere. Awesome shoes, super comfortable.. low-top. Like I said, I love them, but I NEEEED money! Great condition, about two months old, a little bit of dirt on the front and bottom, but I will definitely clean them before I send them out. Paypal PREFERRED, but I will let you know other payment methods. Price includes shipping. Price: $15 $13 >> Size 7 1/2 pumps by Unlisted. Super cute, and BRAND NEW but I bought the wrong size by accident and lost the reciept. Seriously, I just bought them tonight (11/22). They are so cute. They have a little flower on the end of a rounded toe, and they have little ankle straps. I love 'em, but they're too small for me. :( I paid $16 for these babies, but I'm gonna sell 'em to you for cheaper. :) Oh, and I am going to attack the inside with the GooGone to get the little stickers on the soles out. Price includes shipping. Price: $12 $10 >> BRAND NEW size 9 pumps by American Eagle. I bought these tonight (11/22) but then I realized I have nothing to wear them with, and I just knew someone from LJ would want them, so I'm going to try and re-sell them! I paid $20 for them, but I'm definitely not going to try and sell them to you guys for that much! They are neat little pumps with a bow on the front and a neat little corset-type design on both the front and the back. Love 'em! Price includes shipping. Price: $14 $12 >> Size 8 1/2 women's black heel-sandals. These have a strap over the toe which is pretty thick, and then a strap at the top. They are actually a dark black, but I had to fade the photo so that you could see the straps. Heel measures 4". Price: $6   >> Size 7 womens Esprit yellow shoes that look like Converse. They are high-top, and they have the Esprit logo on the side of the high-tops, but it's in white, so you can hardly see it, and if you wear these shoes with jeans, you can't see it at all. They look EXACTLY like Converse, and they are yellow. The inside is super comfortable too. They're in good condition; someone gave them to me because they thought I would like them, but they are too small for me. Price: $10 $9 No picture available. >> Size 9 womens flipflops. They are the weave kind on the bottom, and they have bright pink along the trim on the part that thongs through your toe and the part bordering your foot (on the bottom). Bought 'em and have never even worn 'em. The bottom of these look alot like the ones in the picture below. Price: $3 >> Size 9 womens flipflops, these also have the weave bottom, but they have striped tan colors going around the trim on the bottom and through the thongs part that goes through your toes. Really cute, and haven't ever worn these either. I paid a bit more for these, though. Price: $3   >> White strappy sandals with small heel, size 9. These are sooo cute, but I have no where to wear them to. I wore them to prom this past year. They have a ton of straps going over your entire foot, and a strap in the back to hold your foot in. Price: $8   >> Black clog-like platform shoes, slip-on, size 8. These are just plain black slip-ons with a clog-like bottom. The material that you slip your foot into does not cover your toes. It's a soft, yummy-feeling material. Shipping for these will cost about $4. Price: $5     >> Black strappy LEI shoes. They have a lot of neat strap going over the foot, and they are really high platform. Only worn a few times, and there are some cuffs on the side, but they can easily be washed away, and I will try to scrub them off when I sell them. Shipping for these will cost about $4. Price: $5
Last updated: November 30, 2004.

Under the cut: Iron-on numbers, &pawprint stencil.
>> Iron-on letters that spell out 2005. I think the picture says it all. Each letter would cost $0.75 if you'd like to do it that way. Price: $4 >> Small tiger paw prints stencil. Price: $1.50 All of these prices INCLUDE shipping!
Last updated: November 8, 2004.

Under the cut: Short-sleeve tees, Guess halter, Hollister tank, dressy shirts, Tinker Bell, Eeyore, &more.
NEW SHIRTS AT THE TOP! >> "Increse the Peace" shirt -- GONE! >> Red tank top, size small. Says "Sassy" on it in silver and black rhinestones. Super cute. <3. Price: $4 $3 >> The tank with the strings is a size XS Old Navy tank top, but it could definitely fit a small. It's got little string that make it all lacy in the front, and it is a muscle-shirt material. Very cute, and super comfy. Price: $4 $3 >> Both of the bottom tanks are tagless Faded Glory tank tops, women's size Medium, and they're a muscle-shirt type material also. Super comfy, and great for lazing around the house. One is olive green and the other is a cadet blue type color. Price: $3 $2 >> Three Energie tanks... the photo pretty much shows everything you need to know. All are a size small. Price: $3 $2 >> Size medium Wet Seal Chicklet shirt. Has a betty page like girl on the front, and the words are a glittery baby blue on the pink material. Has baby blue ringlets around the neck and sleeves. Price: $4 $3 >> GlassJAw shirt, size Youth Medium. >> Size medium Wet Seal baby blue glittery shirt. Really cute and formfitting, with little silver glitters all over it. Price: $3 $2 >> Size XS Tilt yellow muscle-shirt like tee. Has baby blue stars over the left breast, and the material in the middle splits. Very formfitting and cute. Price: $4 $3 >> Size medium Jordache white button up with baby blue, green, and other colored stripes. Really cute, especially if you were something over it. Really cute, especially to wear under something or by itself in the summer. Price: $4 $3 >> Size medium Rampage long sleeve shirt with a lacy neckline. Tag says medium, but it fits more like a small. Price: $4 >> Size medium pink, brown, and white striped 3/4-sleeve sweater. Really cute, with a V-neck and stripes all over the shirt. Formfitting, too. Price: $5 $4 >> Size medium black see-through shirt. Good for wearing tanktops and stuff underneath. It's not really fishnet or anything, just a plain black see-through material. Price: $4 $3 >> Size medium (but fits like a small) Eeyore shirt in baby blue. It's got Eeyore on the front, sitting on a large E. It's a very cute shirt, with little dark blue ringer type things on the sleeves. I never wore it though, and I bought it about a year ago. No defects, perfect condition! Price: $4 $3 >> Size Youth XL Arizona Jean Company shirt. Dark blue with light blue sleeve-ends and collar, and it has glittery baby blue stars all down the front with the phrase "Wish Wonder Believe" written on it. I loooove this shirt, but it's too small for me now. Price: $6 >> Size Large Tinker Bell "School for Believers" shirt. It's dark blue, and the logo is in baby blue, with glitter. It's a cute shirt, but too big for me. Price: $6 $5 >> Size small pink and white striped shirt. It says small, but it really fits like a medium. Really cute, and it has a neat little V-neck in the front. It's formfitting, also. Price: $4 $3 >> Size Medium Mudd Jeans ringer shirt. This shirt has a little V-neck type thing in the front, and it's a really cute shirt with baby blue ringers and a hibiscus on the front. Doesn't fit me anymore. This could probably also fit a bustier size small. Price: $3 $2 >> Size medium purple/pink Hollister cami. I also bought this from another Laundro user, but I don't like how it looks on me. Very cute, though. Price: $5 >> Size small Guess halter top in robin's egg blue. It's VERY formfitting, doesn't have a built in bra, but clings so nicely you don't really need one. Really cute, but getting too small for me. Price: $4 $3 >> Size small/medium Playboy bunny tank, yellow with blue bunny & ringers. Really cute, and it's kind of like a muscle shirt material. I hardly ever wore it, so I need to get rid of it. It would probably fit a bustier small best. Price: $5 $3 >> Size medium red shirt with black Chinese symbols on it. I don't know what the symbols mean. I bought this from someone else a long time ago and never wear it. Price: $3 $2 Front logo: Back logo: >> Size medium Old Navy formfitting blue shirt. It has a tennis camp logo on the front in the back in light blue glittery letters. Really comfy, cute shirt, but too small for me. Price: $5 $4 >> Size medium tan colored dressy shirt with ruffled sleeves and a tie in the middle, plus a V-neck. Bought from another user, never wear. Price: $4 $2 >> Size medium (but fits like a small) black and white flowery shirt. It doesn't show in the photo, but this shirt actually has a V-neck. Really good for dressing up, 'cause it's made of a flowy, silky material. I bought it from target for $18. It's got a zipper on the side, and it's a lot cuter on you than it looks in the photo. Only worn once to a graduation. Price: $5 $4 >> Size medium plain black, off-the-shoulder top, with ruffled-up sides. Only worn twice. Great conditon. Soft material. Price: $4 $3 >> Size medium retro-looking 3/4 sleeved shirt with polka dots all over it. It's got a circle thing on the boatneck collar that makes it look like it's vintage. Very cute and comfy, but too small for me. Price: $5 >> Size small pink A. Byers dressy shirt with low V-neck, veryyyy formfitting. Soft material that makes it comfy. The two parts on the chest cross over each other. Price: $4 $3
Last updated: November 30, 2004.

Under the cut: Unionbay, black corduroy skirt, super-dressy dress, stylish white floral dress, &more.
Beautiful dress for sale! It is a size medium from the brand City Triangles. I bought it at Foley's for $70 to wear for the Homecoming parade and I haven't touched it since. It's in perfect condition, no signs of wear whatsoever. I would looove to keep it, but I honestly have nothing to wear it with. It's pretty much all black with the long pink strands that go around the back and tie in the front. It's a very pixie-esque dress. There's a low neck with the straps, and then there is a small slit in the front. There is also padding on the inside of the chest part. Measurements are as follows (these were hard to do because the bottom is many different lengths, but I did my best) -- Bust: 15" across, so 30" all the way around. Length of pink strands (measured from waist): 41" Straps: 17" Length from center-top to center-bottom: 29" Length from waist to center-bottom: 19" Length of side, all the way from the top (below strap): 34" Length of side from waist: 22" Length of back, from center-top to center-bottom: 32" Another note on the fit: I am 5'8", with a 34B bust (36"), and it fits me beautifully. I have 38" hips and a 32" waist. Those are all the possible measurements I can think of, and I can't think of anything else to tell you. It's a soft, silky material on the upper part, and the bottom part is two layers -- one soft, silky black and the other is sheer. It is made up of 100% polyester. I am going to sell this dress for $30 with shipping and handling, which is less than half of what I paid for it. I will even ship internationally if you are willing to pay $30 for it. If you want some more pictures, comment and let me know. My camera batteries died before I could take anymore. If you have any other questions, comments, or whatever, email me at kamikaze_romance@yahoo.com. *********** >> Size 9 Unionbay cargo skirt with six pockets. I have only worn this twice, and I don't really like it. The length is about 22", and the waist is about 30". It's an olive color, and it's a really nice skirt with a fray in the front to make it look like it's cut, but it's really not. Price: $5 $4 >> Size large black corduroy skirt. I like this skirt because it's really cute, and has a little pleat in the front. The waist is about 31" and the length is about 20". The second picture shows you the pleat. There is one small defect with it, though: the back zipper won't stay up, and I'm not sure why. I use a safety pin, though, to pin it to together at the top, and it holds it together, so it's nothing that can't be fixed. Price: $3 $2 Front: Back: Close-up of pockets in front: >> Size 9 Mudd olive green colored skirt with a frayed bottom. The pockets have little holes in them that have rings through them that make it look like it's "pierced", it's very cute. It's about a 30" waist and 20" in length. I have only worn it twice, but I love it. I just don't dress up enough. Price: $7 $6 Back of skirt: Tag: >> Size 8 American Eagle olive-colored skirt. I don't have a picture of the front because my camera messed up, but it's pretty much the exact same as the back. There aren't any pockets, and it's got thick belt loops. Really cute. Bought from another user, but I don't like the way it looks on me. Price: $7 $6 >> Size medium dress by Aqua Blue. It's white with a neat floral design all over it. I only wore this dress one time, and I paid $40 for it at Kohls. It's about knee-length on me, and I'm 5'8". I have 32" hips and a 34B bust and it fits me semi-formfitting. I can measure everything if you request measurements. Price: $12 $10 Prices include shipping. :)
Last updated: December 06, 2004.

Under the cut: Red Dickies capris, black Dickies pants, &more. Other pants & bottoms to be added soon.
>> Size 9 black Dickies. These are a 30" waist with a 30-31" inseam. They are regular girls Dickies, not really a lowrise or flare or anything. They are faded a little, so they actually look like a dark grey. However, they are in good condition with no defects. Price: $7 $6 >> Size 9 Dickies red capris, with a 30" waist and a 24" inseam (measurements from the dickiesgirl website). These are great pants, with a nice vibrant red color. I only wore them two times, and even then they were only worn lightly. I really love these capris, but I never had anything to wear with them. My mom paid a lot for them for me. Price: $10 $8 >> Size 9 black Dickies pants with a lowrise and flared bottoms. I bought them from Pacsun, and the website refers to them as "Josie Stretch Flares" with 22" leg openings. They are 30" in the waist and 30" long. These pants are literally brand new without tags, and I think I would die if I let them go for anything cheaper than what they are. I paid $40 for them, and have only tried them on because they are too short. (I accidently got a 9 regular instead of 9 long). Price: $13 $10 All Dickies pants are in Brand New condition! >> Size 9 Star City grey pinstriped pants. These have a pale pink material on the inside, and they are really comfortable and good for dressing up. They look really good with pink, too. :) Price: $8 >> Size 9 Periscope corduroy cargo pants. They say size 9, but I think that they would fit a size 7 better. They have only been worn one time, because I don't like how they fit me. Price: $5 $4 >> Size 7 Paris Blues capris, but they have been stretched a bit so they can also fit a 9. Really cute, with a whisker-wash and a fade all down the leg. Price: $6 $5 >> Size medium Old Navy grey longue pants. Really comfortable for lounging around the house or sleeping in. Price: $3 $2 Front: Back: >> Size 9 LEI pants. The second photo of the back pockets shows the true color of the pants. I tried to fade the first photo, but my camera was going nuts. I just bought these last week and only wore them one time. They are too tight for me. They might fit a shorter size 9 or a size 7. Price: $10 $9 >> Size 9 Zana*Di khaki corduroy pants. I bought these for school, but I don't like how they fit me. They would probably fit a size 7 better. They also stretch. Price: $6 $5 >> Size 9 super-duper-low-rise Glo pants. They are a grey-blue color with red threading, super-cute, NEVER worn. The low-rise is super-low and very risque. Price: $10 $8
Last updated: November 30, 2004.

Under the cut: Dark denim, white, and cargo shorts.
These are the only shorts I have. The baby blue ones are by Unionbay, and they are a size 9. They are blue with red stitching, and they are a soft, non-denim material. I don't know how to explain them. They're kind've like cargo shorts. They aren't very worn, and they are in super condition. On an average, I think I've only worn them like twice? Then there are the dark denim SO shorts, size 9, with red stitching and a slight fade. They are really cute shorts, but I never wear them. The white shorts are a size 9 by SO, also. They have hardly been worn. They are white with baby blue stitching. * For each pair individually, I would like $4 + shipping. * Last updated: November 17, 2004.

ALSO!

For anyone interested, I am currently looking for CDs. I would like to trade burnt CDs for a little bit of cash + blank CDs. My list is here!! Comment on this post if you're interested, or if you have anything I want!
